decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted 14th April 2015 and numbered SB/9-11/14A Revision B (latest revision not detailed on plan) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the outbuildings shall be those specified within the application form.
Condition : 4 - The proposed outbuildings hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes indicental to the residential use of the dwellings known as 9 and 11 Edward Road.
description: Erection of a single storey detached outbuilding at the rear both houses
